document_data.name: Vatrice Stormwright
document_data.mainbody: '''Vatrice Stormwright''' was an elected member of the [[Council of Elders (Everlund)|Council of Elders]] of [[Everlund]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Vatrice was an easily flustered woman managing a chimney-sweeping business in the city.
